title: OpenSilver
description: Windows, Android, Mac, Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari… – Build Once, Run Everywhere. A free, open-source UI framework for building modern desktop & web applications using C#, WPF and XAML. Our latest 3.1 release offers an AI-enhanced drag-and-drop UI designer, unmatched compatibility with Microsoft Silverlight, and extensive WPF support. Code in C#, VB, or F#, and leverage enterprise-grade controls and libraries, including RIA Services and LightSwitch.
